text.en: O Lord Guru, embodiment of all the oceanic sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: kyabné gyatsö dü zhal guru jé

text.en: Together with vidyādharas, ḍākinīs, oath-bound dharma protectors and their retinues,
text.en-trans: rigdzin khandro damchen tsok ché la

text.en: I fervently and one-pointedly pray to you:
Please pacify outer, inner and secret obstacles into space,
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé barché ying su sol

text.en: Help me overcome the eight fears, untimely death and enemies,
text.en-trans: jikgyé dümin chi dang dra lé gyal

text.en: And cause all my aspirations to be fulfilled just as I wish!
text.en-trans: samdön yizhin drubpar dzé du sol
